job description:
Morton Consulting is in search of a Data Scientist for our client in the Richmond, VA area. The selected candidate needs to have a passion for building and deploying machine learning models. We are looking for someone with proven strengths in functional (reusable) programming (R or Python) to join our clients growing team to help them build their industry-leading risk, fraud, and sales forecasting models.

Requirements:
  • Expert in Python or R
  • Graduate degree strongly preferred (or 4+ years experience with quantitative undergrad degree)
  • 1+ years using SQL
  • 3+ years building predictive models in Python or R
  • 2+ years in a finance, insurance, sales or risk-oriented support role
Ideal candidate:
  • Advanced degree (MS or PhD) from a quantitative field
  • Experience in a fast-moving start-up
  • 3+ years in financial services
  • 1+ years using Spark, Hadoop, or Data Mart
  • 1+ years using AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud
  • Prior experience deploying machine learning models into production
